channel.title: 2 questions delta
channel.description:
First, is there a way to change, lets say, a minecart. It says Search, walk here, and examine. How do i change Search to ride? If there isnt a way, tell me please.
And..
ok so moparscape forums are down, on my pc anyway, but lets get back to the subject. So my npc dialogue is messed up i click "click here to continue" and it just says "please wait..." and it stays like that. Here is a video:
[url=http://s1108.photobucket.com/albums/h420/Jaruanna/?action=view&current=omg.mp4]omg.mp4 video by Jaruanna - Photobucket[/url]
Any fix?

item.title: 2 questions delta
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

kingdomkey01:

To change the minecart option, I know you have to modify/add something in your Class46… The same way you modify an NPC. I’ll get back to you on that… I know it’s in your Class46 in your client.

do you know what to add/change in that. which one means ride or such?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions delta
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

metal k0:

It might be saying loading because it’s the end of the code, I’m not sure though. Can you maybe post it? Also I forgot how to change the minecart to ride with delta, if it’s even possible.

YES, sure. I will post my case 1 and 2 and my case 40: thingy.

[code] case 40:
if (NpcDialogue == 1) {
NpcDialogue += 1;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

		break;[/code]

I got rid of all the other cases because i deleted the cases that i am about to show and added new ones.

	/* NPC Talking */
	public void UpdateNPCChat() {
		/*
		 * sendFrame126("", 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126("",
		 * 4904); sendFrame126("", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906);
		 */
		sendFrame126("", 976);
		switch (NpcDialogue) {
		case 1:
			talk("f", 1429);
			break;
		case 2:
			playertalk("sd", "Poop");
			break;
		}
	}

please help!

Read full topic
